ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Reminder - Possible Quenos Hills event!
ygData.msgSnippet: The list owner needs to turn off the calendar feature.  The spammer is using it to spam us. ... From: MiniGamer To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com Sent: Wednesday,
ygData.messageBody:
The list owner needs to turn off the calendar feature.  The spammer is using it to spam us.
 
----- Original Message -----
From: MiniGamer
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Wednesday, March 20, 2002 10:32 AM
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Reminder - Possible Quenos Hills event!

I don't think anyone does on this list, at least I
have never seen anyone state it.

Yes, Please stop now we know about it.


--- Su <suceress@...> wrote:
> I know this isn't my list and all, but can we please
> stop these reminders. I
> don't play on that server. It's getting on my
> nerves.
> luv,
> -Su
>

> (Veeshan server)
